lead_paragraph: South Korean consumer electronics titan Samsung is planning a strategic conference with investors of a scale not seen since eight years ago to fight a gnawing suspicion that its heyday may have come and gone.

headline.main: Samsung Electronics to Talk Strategy With Investors, Skeptics
headline.print_headline: Samsung Electronics to Talk Strategy With Investors, Skeptics

snippet: South Korean consumer electronics titan Samsung is planning a strategic conference with investors of a scale not seen since eight years ago to fight a gnawing suspicion that its heyday may have come and gone....
